name: DetectionPoint
description: Inference engine results for object detection model outputting points. The flowId is expected to be in the form of <stream id>.<engine id>.

tags.name: frame_id
tags.description: ID of the input video frame fed to the inference engine

tags.name: model_id
tags.description: List of AI model identifiers associated with the result

tags.name: detection_point_data
tags.description: List of Detection Point Data (the results)

tags.name: graph_data
tags.description: List of Graphs (the objects)

tags.name: tracker_obj_id
tags.description: Detected object id

tags.name: super_category_id
tags.description: Super category/class ID

tags.name: super_category_label
tags.description: Human interpreted super category name

tags.name: category_id
tags.description: List of classification category/class IDs

tags.name: category_label
tags.description: List of human interpreted category names

tags.name: x
tags.description: Center X Coordinate (% from 0,0)

tags.name: y
tags.description: Center Y Coordinate (% from 0,0)

tags.name: radius
tags.description: Size of the point (% of image width)

tags.name: probability
tags.description: Network confidence

tags.name: color
tags.description: Detection point color

tags.name: metadata
tags.description: Buffer for extra inference metadata

tags.name: inference_id
tags.description: Unique inference identifier

tags.name: parent_inference_id
tags.description: Identifier referencing a parent inference node or result

tags.name: physical_coords
tags.description: Real world location of the bounding box

tags.name: category_id
tags.description: List of graph category/class IDs

tags.name: category_label
tags.description: List of human interpreted category names

tags.name: directed
tags.description: Determines if this graph is directed

tags.name: layout
tags.description: List of Graph Nodes representing this graph

tags.name: origin_vertex
tags.description: A vertex which will serve as the origin

tags.name: destination_vertex
tags.description: A vertex which will serve as the destination

tags.name: label
tags.description: List of labels associated with this edge

tags.name: x
tags.description: X coordinate distance from the center of the image

tags.name: y
tags.description: Y coordinate distance from the center of the image

tags.name: z
tags.description: Z coordinate distance from the configured floor
